channel.title: Web Loader never working

item.title: Web Loader never working
item.dc:creator: mak
item.description:
Resolved.

He was trying to set URL to keyauth.cc. though intentionally block keyauth.cc as people are supposed to use keyauth.win for API or their own custom domain.

item.title: Web Loader never working
item.dc:creator: Curve
item.description:
Hello there,
So uhm basically I’ve edited the main.cpp of keyauth example (api 1.2) to only do web login


{
	SetConsoleTitleA(skCrypt("Loader"));
	std::cout << skCrypt("\n\n Connecting..");
	KeyAuthApp.init();
	if (!KeyAuthApp.data.success)
	{
		std::cout << skCrypt("\n Status: ") << KeyAuthApp.data.message;
		Sleep(1500);
		exit(0);
	}
	
	std::cout << "\n Waiting for user to login";
	KeyAuthApp.web_login();

	std::cout << "\n Waiting for button to be clicked";
	KeyAuthApp.button("hwid");

And keyauth initializes successfully without any problem
The only thing is that whenever I go to the customer panel (yes I have seller plan) it keeps on saying Waiting on user to login and when I even downloaded the customer panel example from github and hosted it on my localhost it STILL was stuck on waiting for user to login.

I’ve tried with localhost:1337 in the code, nope didnt work
And then ive tried with removing the :1337
Ive tried the normal code, modified code, everything doesnt work

Please help.
Thx!!

Read full topic
